item.title: Curb stones collapsed into our communal area, 25th December
item.description:
The kerb on Fisher Close has collapsed following repeated vehicle impact. Due to the manner in which the kerb was installed directly against the boundary fence of our building, its displacement has caused the fence to be pushed out and unstable.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brooksbys Walk, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous fallen tree over footpath., 25th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): South Eden Park Road, Eden Park, Greater London

item.title: Camera that regulates LTN damaged, 25th December
item.description:
The camera that regulates the LTN has had its cable cut.. I’m not exactly sure why there’s an exposed cable for this and it’s not protected. I would prefer the LTN is functioning because it keeps traffic calmer in the neighborhood.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 67, Whittington Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
